definitions.body: setting, ´[[אַבְנֵי מ]] stones for setting Ex 25:7, Ex 35:9, Ex 35:27 cf. 1Ch 29:2 (´[[אַבְנֵי שׁׂ֫הַם וּמ]]).

installation (of priests): Le 7:37, Le 8:33; = installation-offering Le 8:28 (‖[[אִשָּׁה]]) cf. ´[[סַל־ הַמּ]] v:Le 8:31; ´[[אֵיל הַמּ]] Ex 29:22, Ex 29:26, Ex 29:27, Ex 29:31, Le 8:22, Le 8:29; ´[[בְּשַׂר הַמ]] Ex 29:34.
